In the land of eternal night, the radiance of yang is sparse; in the deepest recesses of the unseen, the qi of yin is dense and obscure.

Moreover, their thoughts and attachments linger on worldly ties, and their souls, scattered in the Yellow Springs, are easily clouded by dust. Because their nature is not pure, their hundred spirits struggle to return. Thus, we descend the life-breath of the nine heavens and summon the crystalline essence of the two luminaries. The illusory and boundless waters are transformed into a vast, cool, and pervasive purity. The inner defilements of a hundred passions are severed, and the true root of a single thought is illuminated.

Let the deceased, so-and-so, understand: that which is not extinguished was never the physical form, and that which endures forever is the original nature. The impurities of the embodied world have now dissolved into emptiness and returned to yin. Unresolved attachments should be cleansed of their own accord. Then, bathed in these limpid waters and purified in spirit, face the palace with reverence, approach the altar, and receive deliverance. Chant the sacred verses of the immortals and enter the bathing canopy.

The Most Compassionate Heavenly Worthy of Salvation and Guidance,
We humbly acknowledge the wondrous efficacy of water, whose virtue is most profound. It divides its numen from the two images and crowns the five phases with its descending moisture. Adaptable to all shapes, it congeals and melts in due season. As it secretly accords with the workings of creation, so too may it wash away the toils of the dusty world. Moreover, when the upright qi of the nine heavens descends and the numinous chapters of the Three Caverns are recited, virtue extends even to the hidden yin realms, and merit lifts the sunken and stagnant.

May the departed soul, so-and-so, clarify pure thoughts and awaken to a nature beyond the mundane. Bathed in orchid-scented waters at the appointed time, may they be cleansed and purified. We offer this for the departed spirit, to aid their ascent to the immortal realms.

Recite the *Incantation for Bathing and Dispelling Impurities*:
The heavens are limpid, the qi is clear; the five qi ascend in radiance.
Sun and moon emit their splendor, refining the bodily form.
The spirit within is cleansed, the fragrant waters refine the essence.
Light and brilliance shine through, illuminating the Supreme Purity.
Qi admits no dust; the five viscera receive the numinous.
Sins vanish from the three paths; misfortunes dissolve in the nine shades.
The five senses are severed; blessings arise of themselves.
Today, the great vow is declared; all is made manifest.
The body receives liberation and ascends to the imperial court.
We offer this for the departed spirit, to aid their ascent to the immortal realms.

Recite the *Incantation for Bathing and Refining the True*:
The Most High and Lofty Perfected, essence of the nine numina,
Cause the soul to fly as an immortal, ascending to the Purple Court.
Bathed in the Flowery Pool, body and spirit become limpid and clear.
Essence penetrates the Great Void; the myriad qi are naturally harmonious.

We humbly acknowledge that the body is the root of suffering, and emotions are the source of delusion. From this body arise the seven emotions; from the six desires spring a hundred cares. Myriad conditions stir, and countless impurities accumulate. If the body ceases to exist, impurities too shall vanish. Yet we fear that at the moment of death, defilements may cling, and in life, dust may adhere. Though the soul departs and returns to emptiness, doubts may remain unresolved. Truly, attachment to the form leads to confusion of the true. Now, by means of the true scripture, we awaken the original nature. We spread the upright qi of the three luminaries and cultivate the life-essence of the two images. Severing the roots of delusion, we release all doubtful thoughts.

We offer this for the departed spirit, to aid their ascent to the immortal realms.

Recite the *Incantation for Bathing, Refining, and Deliverance*:
The Dragon Han is vast and boundless, formless and nameless.
Through countless eons, the Yellow Way opens and clears.
The spirit shines with clarity; the nine souls emit purity.
The Jade Void gleams with radiance; the Great Auroral Light ascends in brilliance.

At the dawn of primordial transformation, all heavens descend in unison.
The Three Origins nurture the Dao; the Two Images embrace life.
The undelivered are delivered; the unaccomplished are accomplished.
The dead are transformed; the withered flourish anew.
All creatures that stir and breathe, every hidden spirit—
those gestating in the womb, all receive their forms.

For the departed whose fate has passed, their souls return to the Three Clarities.
Their po receive refinement and deliverance; in the Southern Palace, their forms are transformed.
Today is most auspicious—all attain radiant illumination.
The Five Emperors witness and reflect; all spirits are universally proclaimed.
Heavenly gods and earthly deities, all river sources,
the Five Peaks and Four Waterways, all renowned mountains,
the Caverns of Mystery, Emptiness, Void, and Immortality—
the Boundless Great Sage, the Most Perfect and Revered Deities—
limitless and boundless, universally witness and deliver life.
The roots of earth are severed; names are inscribed in the Dark Capital.
All spirits respond universally; all heed in completion.

Thus, the law of karmic retribution is no falsehood.
The cycles of ascent and descent arise entirely from past deeds.
Retribution naturally exists; fortune and misfortune are not absent.
Merely through a single deluded thought, though spanning a thousand lives, one remains obstructed.
Now, having bathed and refined the divine abode, the true origin is gathered and restored.
Though the heavy and turbid form has long since decayed,
the pure and empty nature of consciousness remains eternally preserved.
Thereafter, casting off the old and embracing the new, emotions are redirected and thoughts transformed.

We offer this for the departed spirit, to aid their ascent to the immortal realms.

Recite the *Incantation for Bathing in the Eastern Well*:
The Celestial River pours into the Eastern Well; the essence of the Stone Radiance and Water Mother.
The circular light brushes the divine brilliance; the Dark Void cultivates lofty clarity.
The Primordial Beginning parts the heavy night; heaven and humanity follow the moon’s rebirth.
Bathed upon the Orchid Pool, the dragon bears the full Long Star.
The Golden Youth sprinkles fragrant water; the Jade Maiden washes the Five Stars.
Crown and sash are rinsed in jade nectar; the Five Immortals’ forms are refined and delivered.
The body fragrant, myriad perfected ones descend; riding the light, they ascend to lofty clarity.

Thus, former obstructions are removed; defiling dust is cleansed entirely.
The vast expanse of past habits resembles a dream.
The solemn immortal countenance receives the profound shade.
Though the spirit’s departure is not late, the return to life has its appointed time.

We offer this for the departed spirit, to aid their ascent to the immortal realms.

Recite the *Incantation for Inscribing the Name and Restoring the Years*:
Heaven and earth are thoroughly purified; filth and dust are washed away.
The nine paths are refined and transformed; the form returns to the Great Perfected.
The hundred joints receive the numinous; each segment is renewed.
The Pure Void reflects and illuminates; within and without, all is arrayed.
The day is auspicious, the hour favorable—life is delivered, and years are restored.
Jade Youths and Jade Maidens hold your towels for you.
The Dark Numinous Purple Canopy crowns and girds your body.
May you attain long life, rooted in the same origin as heaven and earth.

Thus, qi and consciousness are purified; form and spirit are restored.
Clad in immortal robes and girded in body, crowned and shod to pay homage to the Perfected.
Again, the sacred verses are recited; the feathered garments are manifested.

We offer this for the departed spirit, to aid their ascent to the immortal realms.

Recite the *Incantation for the Golden Pool’s Crown and Sash*:
The Golden Perfected descends in truth; the qi of all heaven is purified.
The Golden Pool is refined and transformed; the body is bathed in form.
The Three Lights shine resplendently; our Dao grows ever brighter.
Feathered immortal robes ascend to the Jade Capital.
The Five Turbidities are cleansed; the Eight Sceneries are illuminated.
Today, having received refinement, sins are extinguished and blessings arise.
Ever to join the Five Emperors, equal in perfection to the lofty spirits.

Thus, the divine mechanism is unfathomable; spiritual transformation is boundless.
Illusory feathered sleeves dance gracefully; the celestial countenance is restored in purity.
Proceeding with guidance, they advance to pay homage.

We offer this for the departed spirit, to aid their ascent to the immortal realms.

Recite the *Incantation for Delivering the Soul with Pure Water*:
The majestic and revered Dao of virtue, its merits complete and perfect,
descends in bodily form to receive and guide, the Precious Master accompanying.
With compassion, the Dharma-water is sprinkled to wash away the deluded masses.
Forever delivered to the Three Clarities’ shore, eternally parting from the Five Turbidities’ mire.

Thus, the bathing and cleansing are complete; the solemn attire is prepared.
Externally and internally purified, thoughts and perceptions are all reverent.
Respectfully approaching the sacred altar, gazing upward to the heavenly gates,
all proceed with guidance, together raising the immortal hymns.

The assembly recites the *Middle Chapter for Guiding the Soul to Pay Homage*.

**Proclamation and Praise for the Guiding Homage:**
Though heaven and humanity are distinct, sincere thoughts and reflections may subtly connect them.
Though the hidden and manifest differ, the gathering of form and spirit enables union.
Moreover, the exalted altar is established, the wondrous model expanded.
Multitudes of perfected ones array their banners before the throne; lofty sages radiate light upon the steps.
This day marks the turning of misfortune into fortune, truly the moment to confess faults and repent transgressions.
Now, the departed spirit must wholeheartedly direct their thoughts, present their words and petitions,
returning body and spirit, submitting life and destiny, paying homage to the Dao, the Scriptures, and the Master.

For the Dao is the root and origin of heaven and earth; the scriptures are the canonical models revealing the hidden.
Yet without the Master, how could the teachings be propagated? Without the sages, how could the scriptures be transmitted?
Revered through myriad ages, relied upon by the Three Powers.
When hidden souls take refuge, they are delivered; when worldly people cultivate and uphold, they ascend as immortals.
Beyond forms and within the world, they are ever to be revered.
Between heaven and earth, they must never be momentarily forsaken.
The departed spirit, with utmost sincerity, wholeheartedly and reverently pays homage.

Prostrate with devotion, pay homage to the *Supreme Boundless Great Dao*.
Prostrate with devotion, pay homage to the *Thirty-Six Revered Scriptures*.
Prostrate with devotion, pay homage to the *Great Dharma Master of the Dark Mystery*.

Reverently, the Most Perfect Great Dao, the Supreme Revered Scriptures, the Dharma Master of the Dark Mystery,
the lofty sages of the sacred altar—
they are the pivot of yin and yang, truly the fundamental source of creation.
Since the departed spirit has obtained refuge, henceforth they shall forever awaken and understand.
Let them not stray into heterodox paths nor be deluded by deviant teachings.
With every thought, let them constantly abide; with every heart, let them remain unwavering.
Across the Three Realms and Ten Directions, without obstruction; throughout the Six Heavens and Nine Earths, all is emptiness.
Awaiting the profound grace, to be delivered in due time.

Again, proceed with guidance, inviting them to the sacred banquet,
to listen to the Dharma, hear the scriptures, partake of offerings, and receive sustenance.

**Recitation of Scriptures, Guiding the Departed to Return to Their Place**

**Incantation for the Offering of Food:**
The revolutions of heaven and earth are inexhaustible in generation and transformation.
The movements of fate and destiny cycle endlessly.
Only through the interdependence of growth and decline do emergence and disappearance alternate.
Since all things have a beginning and an end, this is no extraordinary matter.

Yet when the departed enter the hidden realm, severed from the manifest, how can one not be stricken with sorrow?
Born, their form and spirit dwell in the yang; dead, their corpse and poise sink to the earth.
The courts of the Five Emperors and Three Officials record both good and evil.
The bureaus of the Six Caves and Ten Palaces register both the manifest and the hidden.
Even those who cultivate purity in the world of men cannot escape examination before the underworld tribunal.
Their merit and conduct determine their depth, their karmic conditions govern their transformations.
Thus the boundaries between hidden and manifest, dark and obscure, defy all measure of ascent or descent.
Amid the fumes of burning mugwort and the chill of mourning, how dare we forget our offerings and devotion?

We look up to the Supreme Dao, which unfolds the true statutes.
It bestows grace upon both the living and the dead, extending blessings even to the deepest shades.
Today, on behalf of the departed [Name], we reverently perform this wondrous scripture,
humbly invoking the highest heavens, conducting the rites to deliver and guide the soul, and setting forth the sacred banquet.
Though the offerings are prepared in the world of men, their divine verses derive from the immortal scriptures.
We summon the sacred sprouts of the Five Directions, descend the wondrous *qi* of the Three Mornings.
The food and drink are infused, transformed into celestial fare.
The spirit and form are cleansed, altering the essence of the true origin.
The initial intent shines forth, the original nature becomes luminous.
Awakening to the emptiness of both hidden and manifest, one traverses life and death without obstruction.
Thereafter, the Southern Palace refines the poise, the Eastern Limit pays homage to the true.
The womb is returned, the substance renewed, and yin dissolves;
*qi* gathers, the spirit is born, and immortality is achieved.
We dedicate these merits to the underworld blessings, reverently reciting the true scriptures.
On behalf of the departed soul, we pray for rebirth in the immortal realms.

**Recitation of the Jade Clarity Wisdom-Life Invocation:**
We bow to the Dark Wisdom, the Venerable of Emptiness and Non-Being.
We bow in devotion to the Lord of the Profound Mystery.
You shape heaven and earth without claim to virtue,
yet serve as the refuge for all beings.
With compassion, you turn the wheel of the Five Paths,
moved to pity by the suffering of the Three Ways and hell’s torments.
We bow to the Venerable One in the Golden Palace of Heaven,
to the Compassionate Father of the Six Paths.
We bow to the Supreme Venerable of Jade Clarity,
who has transcended life and death, eternally enduring.
Emerging from existence, entering the void, beholden to none,
you transform the withered and decayed into immortals.
Once in a thousand, ten thousand kalpas, such an encounter is rare.
For the multitudes, you expound the causes and conditions of karma.
You reverse decay, restore the dead to eternal life,
ensuring their form and spirit remain unchanging.

Consider the realm of perpetual existence, where form and substance struggle for purity.
In the silent abode, the soul suffers from dispersion and wandering.
The mourner imagines the departed as present, invoking them through incantation to return.
Gathering that which is empty and formless, we console this longing.
First, we gaze toward the Jade Palace to invoke the sacred,
then illumine the underworld courts to guide the spirit.
We proclaim the transforming scriptures, recite the secret incantations of ascent.
Thus may the departed soul gather its poise and restore its life,
its essence and intent ascending to truth.
Unobstructed in life or death, it partakes of the earnest offerings of the mortal world.
Ultimately, it returns to the Dao’s transformation, paying homage in the boundless courts of the Great Veil.

With focused devotion, we now make our prayer,
on behalf of the departed soul, to aid their rebirth in the immortal realms.

**Recitation of the Heavenly Worthy’s Incantation for Guiding the Spirit:**
Amidst the vastness of Fengdu,
layered with mountains of vajra,
the boundless light of the Numinous Treasure
illumines the scorching pools of flame.
The seven generations of ancestors and all hidden souls,
their forms follow the fragrant clouds and banners.
With the purity of samadhi and wisdom, the lotus blooms,
ascending to where the spirit finds eternal peace.

On behalf of the departed soul, we pray for rebirth in the immortal realms.

**Recitation of the Heavenly Worthy’s Incantation for Ascension:**
The golden light of merit,
faintly opens the gates of the hidden.
The Flower Pool flows with true fragrance,
the lotus canopy drifts upon the clouds.
A thousand spirits, layered in primordial harmony,
dwell ever in the Twelve Towers.
Hasten to proclaim the edict of the Numinous Treasure,
that they may roam freely in the celestial paradise.

On behalf of the departed soul, we pray for rebirth in the immortal realms.

**Recitation of the Three Lights’ Flowing Essence Incantation:**
The wondrous Dao gives birth to the primordial *qi*,
within which yin and yang divide.
Condensing, they form the sun, moon, and stars,
radiant, the Three Lights flow.
The Nine Splendors merge with the Nine Paths,
the Eight Hues delight the Eight Chambers.
Resplendent, they illumine the true body,
the flowing essence returns to the Great Radiance.
Below, they descend to the Abyssal Spring Palace;
above, they ascend to the Realm of Non-Being.
The body, unbound, leaves no trace,
suddenly, all is forgotten.
The Seven Treasures’ flowing essence coalesces,
mingling in the chaotic Flower Chamber.
Swallowing the Nine Clouds’ elixir,
this joy is without end.

On behalf of the departed soul, we pray for rebirth in the immortal realms.

**Recitation of the Jade Yang Dharma-Food Incantation:**
The true *qi* of Jade Yang,
the wondrous Dao divides the Three Luminaries.
The primordial harmony intones the sacred sound,
the Eight Assemblies unfold the jade scriptures.
The Five Elders drink the cinnabar nectar,
floating upon the clouds of light.
The Great Sages and all heavenly hosts,
mount their chariots to drink the jade wine.
The Three and Five determine the register of life,
playing in the Supreme Capital.
The radiance of the flowers shines boundlessly,
hand in hand, they pay homage at the Jade Throne.

Thus, the sacred verses transform all things, shaping their forms.
The incense possesses the power to return the soul,
the flowers reveal the mountain forests’ remedies.
The fruits become fire-jujubes, the drink transforms into Supreme Harmony.
Heaven descends with numinous light, water returns as golden liquid.
Consumed, the spirit is refined; partaken, one soars as an immortal.
This is the mysterious work of the wondrous Dao,
the divine transformation of the Supreme Perfected.

In accordance with the rites, we now universally present these offerings.

**Offering of Priceless Incense to All Heavens:**
Incense of Returning Souls, incense of Returning Life,
Wondrous Cavern True Incense, Heavenly Treasure Incense,
Storax Incense, Infant Valley Incense, Seven Treasures Incense.
The fragrance billows and swirls, inexhaustible in use,
circulating through the Ten Directions, employed in offering.

**Offering of Wondrous and Rare Flowers to All Heavens:**
Golden lotuses, rare flowers of the Jasper Garden,
azure stamens and golden blossoms, jade and gem-like radiant flowers,
phoenix grove immortal flowers, great and lesser wondrous flowers,
seven-colored lotuses.
The fragrance of the flowers is sweet and enduring, inexhaustible in use,
circulating through the Ten Directions, employed in offering.

**Offering of Jewel Forest Rare Fruits to All Heavens:**
Hollow numinous melons, ten-thousand-year immortal peaches,
golden-purple intertwined pears, primordial light white crabapples,
crimson numinous fire-jujubes, flying cinnabar pomegranates.
Inexhaustible when consumed,
circulating through the Ten Directions, employed in offering.

**Offering of Four Kinds of Fragrant Rice to All Heavens:**
Abundant Mountain fragrant rice, Dragon Mountain fragrant rice,
Floating Mountain fragrant rice, Supreme Harmony fragrant rice.
The fragrance spreads abundantly, inexhaustible when consumed,
circulating through the Ten Directions, employed in offering.

**Offering of Seven Precious Elixirs to All Heavens:**
Sun Essence Precious Elixir, Moon Radiance Precious Elixir,
Star Essence Precious Elixir, Sweet Dew Precious Elixir,
Golden Fluid Precious Elixir, Numinous Light Precious Elixir,
Jade Treasury Precious Elixir.
The fragrance spreads abundantly, inexhaustible when consumed,
employed in offering.

Thus, with immortal blossoms and wondrous fruits,
fragrant rice and numinous elixirs,
we invoke the power of scriptures and incantations to purify,
summoning the departed spirits for sacrificial offering.
May they receive the rites and be uplifted,
fully bathed in grace.

Hence, the perfected deities of harmonized light
bow to the Three Treasures to restrain the seven poisons.
The wondrous incantations of the Cloud Palace
order the Three Departments to nourish the seven meridians.
Returning qi to gather spirit, refining form to transform substance,
they listen with compassion to the Dharma,
advancing to pay homage to the perfected.
Facing the numinous presence, we once more recite and expound.

Dedicated to the departed soul,
to aid their ascent and rebirth in the immortal realms.

We chant the *Celestial Worthy’s Three Lights Incantation*:
Turn back and gaze upon the Primordial Net,
harmonizing light to receive its radiant essence.
Seizing the hun to restrain the seven po,
contemplate the navel to stabilize the center.
In movement and stillness, tread the void;
in rest and sleep, repose in the mysterious chamber.
Hunger is sated with yellow coptis blossoms,
thirst quenched with the nectar of the Jewel Forest.
The divine banner commands human demons,
uniting the body to refine true light.
Reflecting upon the vast emptiness,
one roams forever within the void.
Circular penetration dissolves the waves’ edge,
the true blossom knows no end.
Boundless, without beginning or end,
the practitioner must clearly understand.
In silence, forgetting doctrine and teaching,
responding to the mandate, the great rule is fulfilled.
Those who observe the Dao yet fail to transcend
must first enact what is required.
Converging in the non-dual realm,
following the heart’s intent, they unite or part.

Dedicated to the departed soul,
to aid their ascent and rebirth in the immortal realms.

We chant the *Incantation for Nurturing the Hun and Cultivating the Po*:
The rootless numinous mushroom,
source of all wondrous things.
Within, it congeals the seven po,
above, it binds the three hun.
The twenty-four perfected,
enter and exit without gate.
In the profound darkness,
the primordial essence flickers.
Through kalpas, it persists or perishes,
arising with qi.
Externally, it solidifies primordial simplicity;
internally, it nourishes the seven perfected.
The five spirits plant blossoms,
the Three Terraces spread glory.
Purple radiance and white youths,
return to the womb and revert to infancy.
Ascending on clouds, riding mists in the void,
within dwells the Jade Perfected,
named Divine Work.
To the left, embracing Non-Excellence;
to the right, guarded by White Prime.
The dark beast blocks behind,
the cinnabar bird escorts ahead.
Above floats the emerald canopy,
below, golden lotuses support.
Fragrant clouds condense in the void,
sweet dew knows no end.
Inexhaustible in use,
tracing the source without cease.

Thus, the *Numinous Treasure* is the origin of all methods,
the salvation of beings its essence among the Three Caverns.
Profound beyond all scriptures,
its wonder culminates in the central chapters.
Through it, creation shifts and transforms;
by it, kalpas are preserved and regulated.
Ordinary beings who cultivate it attain the Dao,
the departed rely on it to become human.
A thoroughfare for the mundane world,
a treasure tome of the Nine Heavens,
we respectfully recite and intone,
solemnly dedicating it as offering and aid.

Reciting the *Great Brahma Hidden Words* in dedication:
The incantations and offerings of fragrance and delicacies,
the revelation of secret scriptures,
are devoted to the wondrous Dao,
aiding and dedicating the numinous presence.
We humbly pray to hear the divine voice,
to follow the path of virtue,
that in life and death, there be no confusion,
soaring beyond the realm of flowing fire.
May the spirit know no pause,
crossing the hall of blessings.
May the remaining grace
extend universally to descendants.
For this supreme cause,
we wholeheartedly invoke the *Celestial Worthies of the Ten Directions and the Numinous Treasure*,
whose merits are inconceivable.

**Establishing the Refining and Salvation Altar**
According to old rituals, the altar is arrayed with:
the *Celestial Worthy of the Cinnabar Realm of Fire*,
the *Celestial Worthy of Great Unity Who Saves from Suffering*,
the *Celestial Worthy Who Delivers from the Nine Hells*,
the *Celestial Worthy of Vermilion Mound Who Liberates Life*,
the *Celestial Worthies of the Ten Directions and the Numinous Treasure*,
the *Celestial Worthy of the Great Bridge of the Dharma*,
the *Celestial Worthy of the Golden Palace Who Manifests Transformation*,
the *Celestial Worthy of the Perfect Jewel Blossom*,
the *Celestial Worthy of Carefree Joy*,
encircling the altar.

Then, the Dharma Master, through ninefold perfection,
gathers the Nine Celestial Worthies,
conducting the ninefold refinement.
Though this ritual is long-established,
its form is not one that ordinary beings may presume to perform,
nor can it be easily replicated.

Yet in the *Numinous Treasure Dharma* of Mount Tiantai,
beyond the Nine Celestial Worthies,
the first refinement is called the *Bureau for Swiftly Erasing the Register of Sins*,
the *Bureau for Extinguishing Evil Roots*;
the second refinement, the *Bureau for Severing Earthly Bonds*,
the *Bureau for Liberating Ancestors*,
the *Bureau for Delivering from the Earth’s Gates*,
the *Bureau for Eternally Departing the Ghostly Officials*.
Among the nine refinements, such bureaus number over thirty.

Alas! How unfortunate is the *Supreme Scripture of Salvation*!
For the text states that the perfected of the Ten Directions,
the flying heavenly divine kings,
the immeasurable great deities who grant long life and salvation,
all descend from the void,
even the ministers of the heavens.
The recorders of the multitudes of perfected
gather before the Emperor,
reviewing the souls to be delivered,
proclaiming to the Three Realms and the netherworlds,
the domains of Mount Fengdu and its dependencies,
to liberate ancestors from countless kalpas,
and all karmic kin yet unliberated.
This refers to the souls of the already deceased,
who ought to be delivered,
and the burdens of ancestral ties from past lives,
the unliberated karmic kin of countless kalpas,
who should all be pardoned.
Only then are the registers of sins swiftly erased,
evil roots extinguished—
their transgressions dissolved,
their wicked origins absolved.
Freed from the ranks of sinful souls,
departing the company of ghosts,
they receive the talismans of the Primordial Beginning,
transforming through immortality to become human.
The principle is clear and distinct,
not to be obscured or denied.

Yet now it speaks of the *Bureau for Liberating Ancestors*,
the *Bureau for Swiftly Erasing the Register of Sins*—
what meaning does this hold?
The original text describes it thus;
how can one extract a single phrase to create a bureau?
The error is grave indeed.
This has already been thoroughly discussed in the *Chapter on the Bureaus of the Three Realms*.

Yet this matter, where each phrase is taken to establish meaning,
disrupts and confounds the scriptures,
deafening the world—
the offense is unforgivable.
In this *Chapter on Refining and Salvation*,
lest later generations confuse it with the heterodox teachings of Mount Tiantai,
we cannot but address it.

If refining and salvation are conducted solely before the Emperor within the ritual arena,
then to the left is placed fire,
to the right, water—
a single vessel suffices for the canonical form,
without need for extraneous embellishment.
The response to a single thought
lies in the practitioner.
The High Priest offers incense,
secretly petitions,
then ascends the seat, stands, and invokes the incense.

Your Majesty, I have heard that intent cannot communicate itself, but relies upon words to convey its meaning. Since sincerity must ascend to the highest realms, we borrow incense to embody that sincerity. With the first pinch of incense offered, we honor the Supreme and Boundless Dao of the Most High. Through this merit and virtue, may it ascend to benefit the successive sagely ancestors of past dynasties, the august spirits of the imperial ancestral temples, that they may verify the Dao, ascend to perfection, and enter the subtle mysteries. May our present Emperor enjoy ten thousand springs of eternal longevity, his person ever accorded with the hundred harmonies, his court purified by loyalty and goodness, and his realm suffused with the transforming influence of his teachings.

With the second pinch of incense offered, we honor the thirty-six divisions of the sacred scriptures. Through this merit and virtue, we dedicate it to the patron of this retreat, so-and-so, to aid and deliver the departed ancestors of his lineage, the deceased relatives by marriage, and all souls to be delivered, that their spiritual consciousness may receive salvation. We humbly pray that all transgressions be dissolved, all cares be stilled, that they may bathe in the grace of rebirth and swiftly recover their original nature.

With the third pinch of incense offered, we honor the Great Dharma Master of the Mysterious Center. Through this merit and virtue, may blessings return to the patron of this retreat, so-and-so, and to each of his household and living kin. We humbly pray that Heaven bestow abundant felicity, and the Dao extend its wondrous shade. Whether male or female, may they seek the renewal of longevity and rank; whether sons or grandsons, may they see their family’s prosperity endure forever.

**Invocation:**
Your Majesty, I have heard that when the Three Powers first took their places, the ten thousand images were thereby distinguished. The clear and the turbid were molded to form humanity, and through yin and yang, they received their substance. Endowed with the purest essence, they became the most numinous of beings. Yet when qi descended and customs diverged along different paths, and simplicity scattered into varied practices, prosperity and decline arose in the human world, and ascent and descent were apportioned at the gates of the unseen. No sin or blessing escapes scrutiny, no merit or fault eludes judgment. Moreover, life and death are inescapable for humanity, and the cycle of return is the inherent principle of all things. The form and substance cannot endure, and in the end, they follow fate to dissolution. Yet the spirit-soul does not perish, and must inevitably follow its course. If not for the flowing compassion of the Great Dao, how could the hidden souls receive deliverance?

We rely upon Heaven’s descending numinous aid, the yearly clarification of teachings, the great promulgation of canonical rites, and the vast manifestation of models and standards. The precious talismans of the Nine Purities are issued, their talismanic writings resplendent. The divine radiance of the Three Realms is distributed, and the scriptures are thereby disseminated. They can summon the upright qi of yin and yang, and draw in the true essence of water and fire. When hidden souls obtain them, they are transformed into immortals and become human again. When ordinary people cultivate them, they verify the Dao while still alive.

Thus, though I do not measure my own baseness and impurity, I have dared to aspire to emptiness and tranquility, to serve in the offices of the Mysterious Bureau, and to dwell within the Great Teaching. I now humbly follow and adhere to the canonical forms, wishing to deliver the hidden and the dark. Since this retreat has been solemnly established for cultivation, we must carefully follow the rites to transform and deliver. As the patron of this retreat is diligent in remembrance and earnest in prayer, we now deliver the departed souls, that they may swiftly ascend to the good realms.

We reverently look to the Purple Clarity Highest Sages and the Golden Portal Primordial Honored Ones to spread their commands from Heaven and extend their light to illuminate the earth. We proclaim to the Eastern Flowery Upper Prime Minister’s Palace, the Western Terrace Tortoise Portal, the Vermilion Numinous Fire Mansion, the Bureau of True Refinement, the Palaces of the Sun and Moon, the Lords of Yin and Yang, and all offices responsible for molding souls and casting spirits. May they descend the essential brilliance of the Two Luminaries and distribute the harmonious purity of the Two Modes. We command the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens, the Immortal Clerks and Immortal Bureaus to descend together and promptly arrive in full. May they spread the flowing true qi and bestow the elixir of life. May they permit the proceedings to commence and graciously grant deliverance, that the submerged souls may recover their nature, and the hidden spirits may generate their divine essence. We reverently await Heaven’s grace and humbly beseech its response.

Your servant, in awe and trepidation, bows his head and prostrates himself again and again.

**Ritual Proclamation:**
We now burn the Talisman for Summoning the True and Beckoning the Spirits, and from our seat, we summon the generals.

**Invocation of the Ten Directions’ Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthies:**
The original writ of the Numinous Treasure delivers the souls of the departed. In the supreme and wondrous head, the ten cycles deliver humanity. Within it are the gods who deliver people from death, the Southern Culmen Lord of Longevity, the Marshal of the Bureau of Deliverance, the Lord Han of Life-Nurturing, the Southern Supreme Directors of Destiny and Records, the Venerable Gods who extend life and increase years, the deliverers from calamity, the restorers of bones and revivers of the dead, the immeasurable deliverers of humanity.

Today, for this refining and deliverance, the myriad heavens draw near, inclining their chariots and turning their steeds. They oversee the verification of truth and the deliverance of the living. The chancellors of the heavens, the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, the Han Directors of Destiny and Records, the Fire Gods who oversee life, those who hold the registers and grasp the records—all assemble before the Emperor. According to those who should be delivered, they strictly examine the heavens. The Emperor’s command is heard by all spirits.

We reverently summon the Cinnabar Heaven World of the South, the Vermilion Numinous Fire Mansion, the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, the Perfected of the Refining and Deliverance, the Great Spirits of the Refining and Deliverance, the True Yang Qi Master of the Wooden Palace who holds the numinous essence, the Flame Radiance Lad of the Solar Palace, the Cinnabar Rosy Cloud Jade Maidens, the Immortals of the Solar Palace, the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens of the Fire Mansion, the Fire Bell Lads, the Fire Refining Lords, Generals, and Clerks, the True Yin Qi Master of the Metal Palace who holds the numinous essence, the Round Radiance Lad of the Lunar Palace, the Scattered Brilliance Jade Maidens, the Immortals of the Lunar Palace, the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens of the Water Mansion, the Water Refining Lords, Generals, and Clerks, the Sacred Hosts who refine souls and deliver spirits, the officials and retainers of the Numinous Treasure, and all the mighty numina. Hasten to descend to this altar, receive the command, and carry it out.

The High Priest visualizes and performs the rites. Next, he visualizes the true names of the Five Emperors.

When the ritual is complete, at noon, press the *Cutting Horn Seal*; at dusk, perform the *Rising Life Turn*; at dawn, execute the *Solitary Servant Shift*; center the decree, and gather the souls for refinement and summoning.

From the southeast qi, pierce Kan (☵), refining the departed souls. Burn the true writ and recite again:
*"Vermilion Haze holds to the dawn,
Silent Black swiftly unites at midnight,
Grind the Needle, wield the Blade at dusk,
Socks and Wax achieve completion at noon—
Numinous Treasure of the Ten Thousand Things."*

Align the central text with the middle finger. Cease profit, unite with the Orthodox Unity, perfect the dharma wisdom, augment the true, and issue the courier decree to summon and refine.

Draw the five-colored qi. Visualize the various bureau functionaries and *qi*-riding messengers descending upon clouds, each binding and refining the departed souls, summoning their spirit-souls, and clarifying their nature and consciousness to receive refinement.

Recite the *Summoning Souls Capital Incantation*:
*"Jade True Ten-Thousand-Flower Palace,
Lofty Immortals conceal the Emperor’s scripture.
Master the chart of the Nine Heavens’ surface,
Penetrating insight reveals no sentient beings.
Seven revolutions summon the ten thousand spirits,
The Five Peaks come at once to court.
The Three Officials summon the host of souls,
The Recorder examines what is presented.
Plucked from the registers of the Yellow Springs’ depths,
Inscribed in the Upper Clarity’s immortal records.
Seven generations’ bonds are untied,
Defiled blood wholly sinks and scatters.
Return to the womb’s vermilion fire chamber,
To receive rebirth in the Cavern’s midst.
Elder Scribe, guard the divine body,
Let me preserve the Yellow Peace."*

This incantation derives from *The Thirty-Six Chapters of the Great Cavern*. *"Dead souls receive refinement, Heavenly Worthy."*

**Transforming the Water Pool**
With the left hand form the *Hai* (亥) seal and hold the sword in the right, trace the ground from afar to create a water pool. Open the Gate of Heaven, release the Door of Earth, leave the Gate of Man open, and clear the Ghost Road.
*"The Gate of Heaven admits the ten thousand perfected at Hai,
The Gate of Man admits true qi at Shen,
The Earth’s path empties the ten thousand yin at Si,
The Ghost Road conveys yin qi through Yin."*

Recite the *Purifying Heaven and Earth Incantation* once, then sprinkle the pool with dark water. Burn the true writ and secretly petition:
*"White Jade Tortoise Terrace, Nine Numinous Supreme Perfected, Golden Mother of Primordial Sovereign, pray bestow flowing yin qi into the pool below, transforming it into a vast expanse."*

Visualize true water flowing into the pool from the northwest corner, limpid and clear. Draw another breath of northwest qi and blow it into the pool. Next, recite the hidden words once, draw the north qi, blow it into the pool, and spray a mouthful of dark water, releasing the mudra.

Burn the *True Water Moon Essence Talisman*. From the left hand, trace from *Zi* (子) to *Wei* (未), silently intoning:
*"Water Sovereign, descend."*
Seven times, draw north qi and spread it over the water pool.

Burn the *Twelve River Sources Talisman*. Form the *Zi* seal, chant the incantation while drawing north qi, recite twelve times, blow into the water, and visualize the boundless Yellow Flower divine water.

Then cry out in a stern voice:
*"Upper Palace of Southern Prosperity, officials and retainers of the refining pool, water pool generals and divine clerks, refining and delivering jade lads and jade maidens—lead the departed souls to the water pool to receive refinement."*

Visualize the departed souls entering the water pool to bathe their forms. Burn the *True Water Unification Talisman*. Draw the north water qi and merge it with the qi from your own kidneys, then blow it into the water pool.

Recite the incantation:
*"Lord of the North,
Essence of the Black Emperor.
Messenger of the Morning Star,
Generals Ren and Gui.
Mysterious Warrior’s yin spirits,
Solemn and pure tones.
The Five Phases engender transformation,
The myriad things arise.
By the Celestial Emperor’s decree,
Messengers must heed.
Summon the departed souls,
Cleanse and bathe their forms.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands,
By the decree of the Primordial Life Sovereign."*

Burn the *Stone Radiance Water Mother*. Recite:
*"Eastern Well’s Yellow Flower,
Stone Radiance’s royal essence.
Flying Dark Water Mother,
Golden body, jade nectar.
Flowing ceaselessly, source upon source,
An inexhaustible pool pavilion.
Nine Dragons refine and bathe,
The Three Luminaries renew their essence.
Immortals exhale moisture,
Refining and delivering the departed.
Inner and outer shine brightly,
Surface and interior glow with clarity.
Hundred joints, nine orifices,
Primordial qi nourishes and flourishes.
Five viscera, six bowels,
The ten thousand spirits arise of themselves.
Womb knots and fetal bonds,
Open with the water’s flow.
Dead qi severed, evil roots sink and scatter.
Now I refine and transform,
Dead bones into living souls.
Return to the former, change the countenance,
Jade body, golden visage.
Transform and refine the defiled,
Ascend in flight to the Purple Court.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Celestial Emperor’s decree commands."*

Recite again:
*"Great Mysterious Dharma Water,
Number of the Five Phases.
Engendering the ten thousand things,
Cleansing suffering in death.
Were it not for the Great Dao,
How could salvation be achieved?
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Purple Tenuity Emperor’s decree commands."*

Recite this incantation three times. Burn the *Golden Nectar Refining Form Talisman*. Recite:
*"Golden nectar refines the form,
Uniting with the Dao to become true.
Illuminating the Three Luminaries,
This is the root of Heaven.
No darkness, no limit,
No beginning, no end.
Primordial Sovereign, Primordial Origin,
Spiritual demons of the Crimson Palace.
Purple clouds ascend to Heaven,
The body rides the six dragons.
Water above, fire below,
Flowing into the Three Palaces.
Spirit returns to yang brightness,
The Great Dao opens of itself.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Upper Clarity’s Golden Nectar Refining Form decree commands."*

Next, sprinkle the water pool with dark water and recite:
*"Withered, revive; extinguished, live again.
Attain birth in Heaven above,
Receive once more the Supreme Numinous.
By the Nine Heavens’ decree,
Return and renew the fetal infant.
Defiled qi severed,
White corpse returns to life.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Celestial Emperor’s decree commands."*

Three times. Then recite again.

Transform the Fire Pool

The master approaches the fire pool. With the left hand, trace from *zi* to *hai*, then thrust outward; reverse from *yin* to *si*, firmly sealing the gesture. The right hand forms the sword mudra, tracing in the air to shape the fire pool.

Open the Gate of Heaven,
Release the Door of Earth,
Seal the Gate of Man,
Clear the Path of Ghosts.

Recite the *Purification of Heaven and Earth* incantation once, then sprinkle the fire pool with dark water. Burn the true writ and make a secret petition.

East Flower Supreme Minister, Lord of the Azure Lad and Green Youth, I beseech you to spread the flowing yang *qi* and send it down into the pool, transforming it into a vast expanse.

Visualize searing flames melting metal, flowing from the *xun* gate into the pool, blazing fiercely. Draw three breaths of southern *qi* and exhale them into the pool. Then recite the hidden words once, draw one breath of *bing* *qi*, exhale it into the pool, and spray a mouthful of dark water. Release the mudra.

Burn the talisman *Sun Spirit of True Fire Descends*.

With the left hand, trace from *yin* to *wu*, then thrust outward. Silently intone:
*"Fire Sovereign, descend."*
Seven times. Draw southern *qi* to fill the pool.

Next, seal the *wu* talisman and recite:
*"Cast fire ten thousand leagues,
Streaming bells through the eight directions."*
Thirty-two times. Draw one breath of *wu* *qi* and exhale it into the fire pool.

Visualize your nostrils emitting fire bells, illuminating the earth with radiant brilliance.

Then cry aloud:
*"Palace of Southern Prosperity,
Officials of the Refining Bureau,
Spirit Officers of the Fire Repository,
Refine and deliver the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens,
Lead the departed souls to the fire pool for refinement.
Fire-Refined Cinnabar Realm Heavenly Worthy."*

Burn the *True Fire Unification Talisman*.

Seal the *wu* talisman, draw one breath of southern fire *qi*, and merge it with the red *qi* from your own heart. Exhale it into the pool, visualizing the departed souls entering the fire pool for refinement.

Recite the *Fire Incantation*:
*"Lord of the Southern Quarter,
Essence of crimson *qi*,
Mars Envoys,
Generals *Bing* and *Ding*,
Vermilion Bird, Flame Spirit,
Resplendent yang essence.
The Five Phases engender transformation,
All things arise.
By the Heavenly Emperor’s decree,
Envoys, heed my command.
Seize and summon the departed souls,
Refine and deliver their true forms.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Southern Fire Sovereign’s decree commands.
Fire-Refined Cinnabar Realm Heavenly Worthy."*

Burn the *Fire Bell Talisman* and the *Body-Refining Talisman*.

*"Flame Spirits, Flame Spirits,
Fire Bells, Fire Bells.
Above, connect to the Purple Tenuity;
Below, reach the Yellow Profundity.
Repel evil, refine souls,
Spirits of the Crimson Emperor.
Two flame essences,
Three Terraces streaming light.
Refine the embryo, transform the substance,
Temper the *po*, strengthen the *hun*.
Defiled *qi* severed and cast away,
Riding smoke to soar.
Yin *qi* dissolves,
Yang *qi* harmonizes and flourishes.
Spirit and essence grow robust,
Entering the Fire Realm in profound union.
Merge with the Nine *Qi*,
Wholly attuned to the Primal Emperor.
By the decree of the August Heaven,
Molten gold radiates brilliance.
The Nine Heavens gleam,
Enduring fortune and uprightness.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Celestial Emperor’s decree commands.
Fire-Refined Cinnabar Realm Heavenly Worthy."*

Recite again:
*"Qi transforms into man,
The corpse transmutes into the mysterious.
Three transformations, nine refinements,
Ascend into the Nine Heavens.
Through the Nine Heavens’ kalpas,
Deliver the departed souls anew.
Refined and reborn,
Attain the state of True Person.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Celestial Emperor’s decree commands."*
Three breaths of *bing* *qi*.
*"Immortal Transformed into Heavenly Person Heavenly Worthy."*

Next, address the fire pool’s officials and generals, the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens, commanding them to lead the departed souls out of the flowing fire pool. Bathe them in the *Five Sprouts* true *qi*, merging with the hundred spirits.

Visualize the fire-refining spirit generals, Jade Lads, and Jade Maidens leading the departed souls from the fire pool.
*"Five Spirits, Five Elders Heavenly Worthy."*

Burn the *Five Sprouts Talisman*—the true writ of the Five Sprouts.

*"Reverently summon the Azure Emperor of the East,
Azure Spirit Lad,
Officials of *Jia* and *Yi*,
Come from the empty void,
Bearing the *Jueyin* *qi*,
Azure mushroom and jade nectar,
To bathe the departed souls in the Purple Tenuity Palace.

Reverently summon the Crimson Emperor of the South,
Crimson Spirit Lad,
Officials of *Bing* and *Ding*,
Come from the empty void,
Bearing the *Shaoyin* *qi*,
Crimson mushroom and jade nectar,
To bathe the departed souls in the Crimson Palace.

Reverently summon the White Emperor of the West,
White Spirit Lad,
Officials of *Geng* and *Xin*,
Come from the void of mystery,
Bearing the *Taiyin* *qi*,
White mushroom and jade nectar,
To bathe the departed souls in the Canopy Palace.

Reverently summon the *Qi* Emperor of the North,
*Qi* Spirit Lad,
Officials of *Ren* and *Gui*,
Come from the void of mystery,
Bearing the *Shaoyin* *qi*,
Mysterious mushroom and jade nectar,
To bathe the departed souls in the Supreme Yin Palace.

Reverently summon the Yellow Emperor of the Center,
Yellow Spirit Lad,
Officials of *Wu* and *Ji*,
Come from the void of mystery,
Bearing the *Taiyin* *qi*,
Golden mushroom and moonlight,
To bathe the departed souls in the Jade Hall."*

Recite:
*"Thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions,
Naturally attain the true.
Within the true, there is spirit,
The Great Lord of Longevity.
Lord of the Peerless,
Venerable White Prime.
One Supreme Unity, Controller of Destiny,
Peach and Plum unite to prolong.
Grasp the talisman, hold the register,
Preserve life, plant the root.
Roam the Upper Clarity,
Enter and exit the Flowery Chamber.
Within the Eight Profundities,
In the subtlest of subtleties.
Below, govern the human body,
Mud Pill and Crimson Palace.
Within, regulate the Five *Qi*,
Merge with the hundred spirits.
Ten revolutions return the spirit,
Myriad *qi* ascend as immortals.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Celestial Emperor’s decree commands."*

Raise the banner and stand upright at the center of the altar. The High Master petitions again:

*"The departed, so-and-so, early entangled in the world’s net,
Long ignorant of true cultivation.
The Nine *Qi* found no return,
The Five Phases lost their balance.
The Three Hun suffered judgment,
Myriad decrees left them adrift,
Without good causes to reverse their fate.
Difficult to restore life’s principle.

Now, in accordance with the canonical rites,
I invoke the true numina.
Embodying the creative power of Heaven and Earth,
Following the harmonizing numbers of yin and yang,
I pair water and fire,
Bathe and refine spirit and form.
Descend the essence of the Two Luminaries,
Congeal the flourishing pivot of the Five Phases.
Establish the root, receive the ancestor,
From murky depths generate vital fluid.
In profound obscurity, gather the true,
In vagueness, take form.

For all things must end and then begin,
Principle flows through transformation.
Ghosts return to become men,
Bodies undergo immortal transfiguration.

Having already reported to the Nine Heavens’ Celestial Emperor,
I beseech the bestowal of auspicious blessings,
Recording the life spirits of the departed.
Grant the upright *qi* to the Nine Passes,
Unite the fetal embryo in the tenth month."*

Once more, I draw from primordial chaos,
To behold anew the clear and bright.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Primordial Unity, the Yellow Pervading Essence of the Womb-Mandate,
To enfold the womb,
That its source may flow freely,
Ascending to Heaven to engender and complete.

I burn the first talisman and recite the chapter:
The *qi* of empty vastness blends,
The soul soars through the dim and distant.
Eternal well-being is decreed without end,
Yet how remote from the root’s origin.
The suffering soul sinks through nine nights,
At dawn, it yearns for the sun’s ascent.
The Great Possession opens the Gate of Mystery,
The Highest Heaven descends in morning radiance.
Yellow clouds congeal in the numinous palace,
Yin and yang *qi* intertwine in form.
The womb’s origin knits long life,
Evil roots dissolve in transformation.
Peach and well-being merge with refined essence,
The Two Emperors flourish like jade petals.
I irrigate the Gate of Womb-Mandate,
Refining essence, spirit unmarred.
The Nine Heavens’ Numinous Chapter commands,
The spirit of life transcends itself.
The Primordial Lord bars the path of death,
The Marshal expounds the Cavern’s hymn.
One chant summons the myriad Perfected in harmony,
Nine recitations bring all heavens to court.
I bow my head in reverence through kalpas of ages,
Celebrating this flourishing of the old sprout.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Womb-Mandate, the Cavernous Purple Gate of the Dark Profundity,
To enfold the embryo,
That its knotted roots may unbind,
Resounding below to Earth to secure the numinous.

I burn the second talisman.
Boundless, the Purple Gate is formed,
*Qi* exalted as the Heavenly King.
I open the passage for the soaring soul,
Congealing transformation in the wheel of empty vastness.
The old root severs past attachments,
The fundamental cause recalls its former lineage.
Through long nights, it sinks in distant kalpas,
Yet faces the great cycle’s thoroughfare.
The Imperial Perfected first clarifies essence,
Named and called the Primordial Yang.
The Infant, Historian Bo Hua,
Forms the embryo, guarding the Yellow Chamber.
Severing roots, closing the gate of death,
Nurturing the infant with joyful countenance.
Meditation and goodness guide the numinous *qi*,
Mysterious nourishment sends forth celestial fragrance.
Radiant splendor refines the jade substance,
Essence is tempered, form naturally perfected.
Devoted to the profound, fostering life’s ascent,
Arrayed in order, the Hall of Light is complete.
The Great Void stirs numinous convergence,
Commanding me to compose the Life-Spirit Chapter.
One chant moves the Nine Mysteries,
Two recitations unite Heaven and Earth.
Blending in mutual harmony,
Nine recitations accomplish human perfection.
The Great Sage celebrates primordial felicity,
Scattering blossoms in homage to the Great Void.
All heavens rejoice in unison,
All bow their heads in reverence.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Long-Numinous Bright Immortal, the Essence of the Soul-Mandate,
To enfold the three souls,
That the Gate of the Soul may be refined,
Communicating with spirit to reach essence.

I burn the third talisman.
Xu Yan governs the Three Numinous,
The Primordial *qi* divides from the Mysterious Origin.
Vast and boundless, the Great Brahma spreads,
Radiant splendor adorns the jade vessel.
The bright mirror flies with the numinous light,
Opening the passage for the long-night soul.
The wandering soul hastens to its destined return,
*Qi* upon *qi* returns to its original root.
The Great Emperor is titled Yang Hall,
Named the Lord of Eight Numinous.
The Nine Passes turn the path of Lu,
The embryo’s *qi* engenders the Upper Origin.
Ascending Brahma, the life register is reviewed,
The Great One assists in refining essence.
The Mud Pill Palace spreads the Emperor’s seat,
The Three Sections and Eight Sceneries divide.
The soul’s birth gathers the wandering *qi*,
Nine revolutions self-attain immortality.
Resounding, the Nine Heavens’ tones,
Jade chapters give rise to the myriad spirits.
Three recitations array the proper positions,
*Qi* joins the Eight Celestial Gates.
The Mysterious Pass bars the gate of death,
The numinous guards the source of fluids.
Responsive convergence stirs the numinous count,
Illuminating the Dao through revolving numina.
Celebrating this infant’s transformation,
I bow my head in praise of the Cavern Scripture.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Yang Corpse’s Dark Pervading Evolution, the Essence of the Po-Mandate,
To enfold the seven *po*,
That the gate of sighs may close,
The Heavenly King descend as an immortal to bring peace.

I burn the fourth talisman.
Silent, the colorless origin,
Dou Shu resists the Great Luo.
Numinous transformations divide the Four Sceneries,
Myriad strands of emerald and crimson clouds.
The wandering *po* does not look back,
Once departed, it pierces the host of demons.
The Divine Duke gathers the wandering *qi*,
Floating, refining the plain blossoms.
Flourishing splendor anchors the kalpa’s term,
Riding the cycle in accord with the numinous chart.
The Cavern’s Life-Spirit Chapter,
Jade tones soar through the Nine Clouds.
One chant convenes the myriad Perfected,
The soaring soul unites in harmony.
Nine revolutions complete the numinous radiance,
Lush and resplendent, the jade blossoms shine.
Dou Shu opens the Great Possession,
One celebration enjoys abundant blessings.
The Supreme Sage turns the Emperor’s chariot,
The infant suddenly sings.
Overwhelmed by this propitious gathering,
All bow their heads in harmony.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Five Immortals’ Central Numinous, the Essence of the Viscera-Mandate,
To enfold the five viscera,
That the viscera may be cool and clear,
The Five Emperors attend the Perfected to preserve spirit.

I burn the fifth talisman.
Fluttering, the Five Emperors’ chariots,
Floating, the Mysterious Upper Gate.
Strolling through the Yellow Flower Wilderness,
The returning soul rejoices in joyful serenity.
Gathering the soaring light of empty space,
The old souls are mostly gone.
The Great Tenuity turns the Yellow Banner,
Wu Ying commands the numinous pennant.
Summoning the long-night palace,
Opening the passage to receive the life-spirit.
The Duke’s son assists Huang Ning,
Recording in full both form and spirit.
Jade chapters penetrate the dark numina,
Five revolutions divide Heaven and Earth.
*Qi* refines the primordial viscera,
The Purple Gate naturally engenders immortals.
Numerous cycles convene the host of Perfected,
The Yang’s opening responds to abundant resonance.
Jade maidens irrigate the Five Fragrances,
The Holy Mother celebrates ten thousand years.
The Three Realms rejoice in unison,
Bowing their heads in homage to the Heavenly Venerable.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Lofty Perfected’s Thorough Fusion, the Essence of the Spirit-Mansion Mandate,
To enfold the six bowels,
That the stomach’s tube may generate fluids to receive harmony.

I burn the sixth talisman.
Responding to sound in the colorless realm,
Radiance crowns the ten directions.
Revolving transformations leave no shadow,
The dark term hastens to the Dao’s arena.
The numinous chariot awaits no bridle,
Brightly, the Life-Spirit Chapter arises.
The empty vastness is truly boundless,
The numinous soul, too, grows strong.
Refining the embryo, returning to the original beginning,
Ever riding the flying mysterious beam.
Accumulating loss of Heaven’s truth,
Scattered thoughts await the constant path.
Severing and felling the womb’s stagnant tree,
The heart roams beyond the Upper Capital.
The profound convergence is most mysterious,
Awakening me to forget both principle and self.
Bestowing blessings at the Nine Heavens’ summit,
Exchanging rites with the Earth’s auspicious stars.
Blending transformations, returning to the Primordial One,
Loftily uniting with the Primordial King.
I bow my head, accompanying the numinous journey,
Forever parting from the clamor of dust.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Lofty Immortal’s Cavernous Scriptures, the Essence of the Primordial Mansion Mandate,
To enfold the nine orifices,
That the nine orifices may open,
The heart’s spirit grow bright and clear to unlock the gates.

I burn the seventh talisman.
The Mysterious Convergence governs the boundless,
Blended *qi* returns to Brahma’s aid.
Devoted to the plan, the numinous transformation unfolds,
Silently advancing through cold and heat.
Riding the count, constructing the steadfast branch,
Sleeves flutter, brushing light feathers.

Within the jade chamber hums a wondrous resonance,
Ascending to the lofty abodes of the divine.
The wheel of perfection turns without cease,
True immortals arrayed in solemn ranks.
Above, the celestial thoroughfares stretch boundless,
The profound origin plunges into myriad depths.
Lush leaves veil kingfisher mists,
Their shade lingering o’er limpid isles.
Roaming in delight, the five spirits rejoice,
Abundant thoughts soar with radiant companions.
The five trials depart by principle’s course,
The unburdened heart finds joy in itself.
The luminous soul follows its root-source,
Lingering weightless in empty space.
Seven recitations unseal the layered gates,
Obstructions dissolve—not by divine might,
But through the inner workings that set all in motion.
In lofty chant, I bow and raise my head.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Flourishing Mansion Mandate, the Primordial True Numinous Transformation’s congealed *qi*,
To enfold the eight luminaries,
That the three divisions and eight luminaries
May fully integrate form and spirit,
Illuminating the darkest night to guard the body.

I burn the eighth talisman.
In the clarity of the highest heavens,
At the appointed hour amidst felicitous clouds,
Jade verses scatter into the unburdened heart,
A solitary radiance seeks the numinous assembly.
Resplendent, the auroras unfurl,
No spirit’s lapel fails to advance.
Jade branches stream with ethereal echoes,
Leisurely discoursing on the subtleties of the void.
Divine tones vibrate through the hollow vastness,
The nine mysteries depart from their hidden lineages.
With keen perception, no stagnation remains,
Coming and going like loosening a sash.
Illumined, one recognizes the *Shengshen* chapters,
Soaring on high without end or defeat.
The mysterious radiance gleams on the celestial thoroughfare,
Traces transcend the divine realms beyond.
Resonance knows no bounds of form,
Merely circulating the four great elements.
With focused mind, I bow and recite,
All sages together proclaim their joy.

Reverently, I invoke the Imperial Perfected *qi* of the Sacred Peak Mansion Mandate, the Primordial Spontaneous Mysterious Illumination’s *qi*,
To enfold the body,
That the three barriers, five viscera,
Six palaces, nine chambers,
Golden towers and jade halls,
Twelve layered gates,
Purple portals and jade pavilions,
Thirty-six thousand body spirits,
Eighteen thousand palace precincts,
Three hundred sixty mechanisms,
Root and origin, primordial beginning,
May all at once generate spirit.
Let the spirits deploy *qi*,
*Qi* fills to resound with voice,
Voice exalts the spirits’ completeness,
Hair and body come into being,
All heavens descend to witness,
To protect this body.

I burn the ninth talisman.
Without entanglement, there is no attachment,
In profound profundity, the void clarifies.
Transformations wheel without fixed order,
Numbers arrive yet cycle back.
Who claims the colorless is level?
Lofty, it brims with hills and mounds.
The darkened mind surrenders to its course,
Aspiring high to purify the spirit’s journey.
Such encounters transcend years and ages,
How can kalpas be named?
The floating soul follows its former branch,
Returning to the womb by its own constancy.
Numinous resonance pervades the Great Void,
Treading upon the heavens’ frost in flight.
The ford’s currents stir myriad streams,
Silently congealing, the true spirit ascends.
Without love, there is no sorrow,
In lofty contemplation, I bow and rise.

The adept again declares:
The three *qi* are heaven and earth’s honor,
The nine *qi* are the myriad things’ ancestors.
Thus, the three unite to form virtue,
The nine yang become the true.
Truly heaven and earth’s mysterious work,
The marvelous function of yin and yang.
Now, for the deceased [Name],
I invoke the nine heavens to descend *qi*,
The five constituents to gather spirit.
Having received the Great Dao’s singular grace,
One ought to heed the Highest Perfected’s compassionate instruction.
For the nine *qi* generate the spirit,
The three origins nurture the substance.
Yellow and white achieve mutual transformation,
Chaos merges form.
The six jia circulate,
The five phases take root.
Modeling heaven and emulating earth,
Embracing yin and exhaling yang.
Thus, earth’s hardness and softness,
Respond to heaven’s patterns and degrees.
A thousand perfected stand arrayed,
Myriad images stand in solemn rows,
Uniting with the Dao and communing with the true—
Both exalted and noble.
Hence, the head becomes Kunlun,
Hair becomes stars,
Eyebrows become the canopy of flowers,
Eyes become sun and moon,
Nose becomes the pillar of heaven,
Ears become heaven’s windows,
Mouth becomes heaven’s gate,
Face becomes heaven’s mirror,
The five peaks and four rivers,
Eight seas and nine rivers,
One origin and two principles,
Three luminaries and four images,
Five phases and six pitch-standards,
Seven origins and eight luminaries,
Nine palaces and ten directions,
Thirty-six heavens,
Thirty-six earths—
None are not complete herein.
All are the wondrous responses of the Great Dao,
The wellsprings of the divine and numinous.
If you cannot honor its *qi*,
Revere its spirit,
Reflect upon this beginning and end,
Contemplate its original truth,
And yet succumb to restlessness, vulgarity,
Lust, evil, and chaotic thoughts,
Then you injure its spirit and *qi*.
When *qi* is exhausted, spirit departs,
The hun sinks into the five paths,
The po perishes in the three ways,
Karma accumulates in the nine yin,
Calamities flow to the seven ancestors,
Life after life, kalpa after kalpa,
Without respite—how can this not be lamentable?
You ought to purify the void,
Extinguish desire, rectify thought,
Avoid rebirth,
Receive form in the human Dao.
Above all, nurture purity, embrace simplicity, return to the origin,
Within the wisdom-nature, unite with the true Dao.
Then the study of immortals becomes possible,
Ascension to heaven attainable.
Thus, the meaning of spiritual transformation
Is the gateway to studying immortality and refining spirit,
The heart’s goodness that turns toward the Dao in later times.
After the two principles nurture substance,
The nine *qi* form the body,
Proceed to burn and transform the Jade Infant’s Numinous Transformation Talisman.
You must thoroughly grasp this intent,
Never forget this moment.

I burn the Jade Infant’s Numinous Transformation Talisman.

The Upper Origin True One guards and secures the muddy radiance.
The Middle Origin True One guards the spirit in the Crimson Palace.
The Lower Origin True One guards and protects the Gate of Life.
The three origins unite in radiance,
Preserving life and prolonging years.
Summoning spirits to induce *qi*,
Life descends naturally.
Transforming form, refining the skeleton,
Bones transmute into immortality.
Feathers light, they soar,
Ascending before the Emperor.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.

Next, sprinkle water upon the initiated departed soul, and recite the incantation:
Heaven’s *qi* is limpid, the five colors resplendent on high,
Sun and moon exhale their essence, refining the body’s form.
The spirit’s essence within grows bright,
Dharma fire refines the true.
Radiance and light pervade with brilliance,
Shining upon the Highest Clarity.
*Qi* does not receive dust,
The five palaces receive the numinous.
Sins vanish from the three ways,
Misfortunes dissolve in the nine darknesses.
Evil roots are severed,
Fortune and blessings arise of themselves.
Today’s great vow,
All is proclaimed and pledged.
The body receives liberation,
Ascending into the imperial court.

Another incantation:
The Northern Dipper brings death,
The Southern Dipper bestows life.
Myriad spirits attend and guard,
All heavens record the name.
Unobstructed vision,
Primordial harmony, advantage, and uprightness.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.

Release the water vessel, and declare:
You departed souls,
Having received refinement,
Bow beneath the altar,
Receive the merit and virtue,
Entrust your transformation to the realms of humans and heavens,
Roaming freely and at ease.

Next, perform the Two-Hand Seal of the Writ, lifting the Register of Ascension to the Celestial Realm from Fengdu. Blow a breath of Central Heaven’s qi into it, then place the register down and recite the incantation:

By the Primordial Mandate of Yuanshi,
The hour and moment of ascension arrive.
From the Northern Capital’s Frigid Pool,
The host guards the form and soul.
Subduing demons, ensuring protection,
Promoted to ranks in the Southern Palace.
Departed souls receive refinement,
Transmuted into immortals, reborn as humans.
The living body receives liberation,
Enduring through kalpas without end.
Revolving with the kalpic cycles,
Attaining years equal to Heaven.
Forever delivered from the Three Paths,
The Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships.
Transcending the Three Realms,
Roaming freely in the Supreme Clarity.

**Proclamation of the Precepts**

We have heard that before the Great Ultimate divided, a single qi blended in harmony. From the One, the Three emerged, and the primordial net unfolded. Above, the pure canopy of Heaven was established; below, the earthly chariot of Earth was laid, nurturing the essence of the void to give birth to all beings. The human body, modeled after Heaven and Earth and harmonized with yin and yang, is thus uniquely endowed with spirit among the myriad things.

This single qi, in its origin, precedes Earth and Heaven. Heaven and Earth rely upon it to achieve their covering and bearing; all beings receive it to form their shapes and substances. Once shape and substance are established, there is a beginning and an end. If one can recognize the mechanism of life and death and comprehend the transformations of existence, then death is not to be feared, nor is life to be overly rejoiced in. The body is a burden to the self, and the world is not truly real. Wealth and honor are like floating clouds; love and affection are but dreams and illusions. One must awaken to this truth, turn inward to examine the true source, sever the heart of greed and attachment, and extinguish deluded thoughts. When a hundred cares dissolve, the singular nature remains serene. Life and death, coming and going—what binds them? One may ascend to the breath of the void.

For we receive this single numinous essence, which shares its beginning and end with Heaven and Earth. Why then be burdened by the cycle of death and life? Humans do not inherently despise life and delight in death; it is only because they are entangled in the world’s net, sunk in the darkness of love’s bonds, their thoughts impure, and myriad delusions arising. They indulge their passions without limit, never awakening to the finitude of life. Wealth and honor burn the body; fame lingers in the mind. Treasures accumulate like mountains, yet desires remain unfulfilled. When the great reckoning arrives, none of it remains one’s own. After the body perishes, attachment only deepens. In the silent, shadowy paths and the abyssal night, one realizes that karmic retribution has its end, but the delusion of attachment knows no conclusion.

Thus, the Most High initiated the transformation of the Void, and the Great Dao opened the gate of purity, rescuing those lost on the path and delivering them from the web of doubt. This is the fundamental intent behind the establishment of teachings and precepts. Now, these departed souls have severed their worldly ties, yet their spirits have not fully restored. Though the cycles of fate naturally allow for rebirth, their inability to transcend arises from lingering attachments and unrelinquished desires. Therefore, we now petition the Perfected Ones above, beseeching the descent of the Mandate. We spread the true qi of yin and yang, unite the essence of water and fire, restore their spirit and clarity, refine their corporeal awareness, renew their primordial chaos, and re-establish their foundation. This may serve as a fortunate bond through countless kalpas, a blessing for a thousand lives.

Yet the departed souls must also awaken and reflect, adopting a lofty and enlightened perspective, so they may forever escape the cycle of rebirth and bid farewell to obstacles and afflictions. They must deeply comprehend the principle of life and death and thoroughly penetrate the mechanism of existence and cessation. They should recognize that the world’s gold, jade, pearls, and treasures are not true valuables; fine silks and brocades are not wondrous; wealth and extravagance are not honorable; grains, silks, and material goods are not worth clinging to. As for husbands and wives, parents and children—though they are said to embody the weight of great ethics—gathering in life and scattering in death is the natural order. How can one ensure their permanence and longevity?

Yet these are all matters of human sentiment, unavoidable in their nature. Now, we declare that material things are not worth cherishing, and love is not worth clinging to. What, then, is the reason? The four great elements and the hundred bones—who does not cherish and value their own body? Yet when fate is exhausted and destiny fulfilled, the form dissolves and the spirit scatters; blood, corpse, flesh, and substance all decay and rot. Looking back upon this body, one cannot even possess it—how much less wealth and love? From this, we see that in life, one cannot avoid following worldly ties, but in death, one need not be deluded by love and attachment. What should be reflected upon is the single numinous essence, which through kalpas and lives has never perished. Thus, we know that form and appearance burden us, the corpse and corporeal soul confuse us, treasures bewilder us, and love and affection delude us. Our original true nature is inherently pure, void, and tranquil, transcending the Five Phases. Then, the causes of sin and fortune, the retributions of enmity, all melt away like ice, and Heaven and Hell become as empty space.

One must recognize that before the body’s birth, there was nothing at all. Only then can one know the root of consciousness, awaken to the original nature, and transcend the mundane. Bathing the form in the Great Sun and returning to the human realm is but a minor matter. Now, the refinement and transformation are complete, and the time of ascension approaches. If reborn among humans, do not forget cultivation and discipline. In life after life, always return to the true path; in generation after generation, never fall into delusion. The Three Refuges and Nine Precepts of the Most High shall be solemnly proclaimed in the human and celestial realms—do not forget these admonitions.

**Proclamation to the Departed Souls: The First Refuge—The Supreme Treasure of the Dao**

The Treasure of the Dao precedes Heaven and Earth, formless and nameless. To call it "non-existent" would deny the root of creation; to call it "existent" would make it difficult to glimpse the threshold of the subtle and profound. It generates the myriad qi, yet its bounds cannot be fathomed; it establishes the Three Powers, yet takes no credit for its work. Sometimes it conceals its name, sometimes it gathers form and disperses qi. Its blessings flow through ten thousand kalpas, its height encompasses the One Origin. In life after life, generation after generation, one should revere the Treasure of the Dao.

**Eulogy of the Treasure of the Dao**

**Proclamation to the Departed Souls: The Second Refuge—The Supreme Treasure of the Scriptures**

The Treasure of the Scriptures refines emptiness into Brahma, weaves qi into texts, establishes the ultimate and dispenses blessings, adapting teachings to the needs of beings. It reveals the secret store of the Three Vehicles and arranges the sacred books of the Four Assistants. It safeguards kalpas and stabilizes Heaven and Earth, connecting with the cosmos to support creation.

The Treasure of the Scriptures broadly encompasses the profound mysteries, eternally ferrying across the ford of delusion. In life after life, generation after generation, one should revere the Treasure of the Scriptures.

**Eulogy of the Treasure of the Scriptures**

**Proclamation to the Departed Souls: The Third Refuge—The Supreme Treasure of the Masters**

The Treasure of the Masters transmits the truth and expounds the Dao, establishes teachings to deliver beings, serving as the model for past and present, guiding both the hidden and the manifest. As the Lord of the Mysterious Teachings, the Orthodox Celestial Master—whether ranked among the heavens or descending in divided forms—presides as the patriarch of the Three Caverns’ ancestral altars, the perfected immortals of the Ten Directions who have attained the Dao. They rescue and instruct those yet to come, illuminating the correct transformation, their regulations enduring as standards, their blessings permeating boundlessly. In life after life, generation after generation, one should revere the Treasure of the Masters.

**Eulogy of the Treasure of the Masters**

The three refuges proclaimed above constitute the orthodox teaching of past and present, the true宗 of Heaven and Earth. Know that the myriad transformations arise thereby, and the Three Powers are established therefrom. Whether hidden as spirits or manifest as humans, within the Three Realms and the bounds of yin and yang, one must discern the inverse and the upright, rightly distinguish the true from the deviant. From this moment onward, forever return to the correct Dao. Do not fall into demonic teachings, nor be deluded by heterodox paths. With a single thought sincere, no evil shall enter. The correct principle is without admixture, and the great Dao is smooth and unobstructed.

Now that the departed soul has thoroughly grasped the true mechanism, it is fitting to clarify the precepts. The statutes of the Most High shall be reverently proclaimed.

**Hymn of Wisdom**

**Proclamation of the Nine Precepts**
The First Precept: Reverence and yielding, filial piety and support of parents.
The Second Precept: Diligence and toil, loyalty to the sovereign.
The Third Precept: No killing, compassionate rescue of all beings.
The Fourth Precept: No licentiousness, rectifying the body in its interactions.
The Fifth Precept: No theft, extending righteousness and diminishing the self.
The Sixth Precept: No wrath, avoiding fierce anger that harms others.
The Seventh Precept: No deceit, guarding against flattery and treachery that injure the good.
The Eighth Precept: No arrogance, forsaking haughtiness toward the utmost truth.
The Ninth Precept: No duality, upholding the precepts with single-minded devotion.

**Hymn of Upholding the Precepts**

The nine precepts above are the sagely instructions bestowed by the Heavenly Worthy. If one can constantly uphold and maintain them, after the body perishes, one shall never sink into suffering. Today, as the departed soul stands in the darkness of the netherworld at the hour of deliverance, it must first comprehend these teachings. In the future, when assuming a new form, loyalty and filial piety shall be foremost, integrity and prudence self-maintained, every action conforming to the rules and measures of the Dao. At such a juncture, this is not merely rooted in innate nature but is the fruit of cultivation before rebirth. Thus, whether hidden or manifest, one should invariably align every thought with the Dao, every念 with truth. In departing and returning, never stray from the correct principle, not a speck of dust clinging, all cares dissolved into emptiness—how could this depend solely on the precepts?

We now respectfully present the Golden Tablet of the Jade Inscription, the Longevity Spirit Talisman, and the Most High’s Register of Ascension to Heaven as the warrant for transcendence. Departed soul, listen carefully as we reverently proclaim and enact this.

**Proclamation of the Register and Altar Document**

The High Priest stands and intones in a loud voice:
*Temporarily conjoined yin and yang, returning to the original true self,*
*The numinous spirit restores itself to the body it once inhabited.*
*Unattached to the myriad conditions, freed from the wheel of rebirth,*
